techniques.name: Deep Breathing
techniques.description: Slow, diaphragmatic breathing to activate relaxation response
instructions: Inhale slowly through your nose for 4 counts
Exhale slowly through your mouth for 6 counts

techniques.name: Progressive Muscle Relaxation
techniques.description: Systematically tensing and relaxing muscle groups
instructions: Starting with your feet, tense the muscles for 5-10 seconds
Release and notice the feeling of relaxation
Focus on the contrast between tension and relaxation

techniques.name: Thought Challenging
instructions: Notice when you're having a negative thought
Look for evidence that contradicts the thought
